string-array.name: stories
string-array.item: The woman woke up at night, saw a shadow and in a couple of minutes committed suicide.
The man killed the mayor in front of the crowd, but no one prisoned him.

string-array.name: full_stories
string-array.item: The woman woke up at night and saw a shadow from a post pigeon. The letter was from her husband\'s colleague, it said that the husband was dead. Unable to stand the burden of loss, the woman committed suicide.
The man worked as an executioner and executed the mayor for crimes.
